Atlanta.WXIA-TV: WXIA-TV, virtual channel 11 (VHF digital channel 10), is an NBC-affiliated television station licensed to Atlanta, Georgia, United States. The station is owned by Tegna, Inc., as part of a duopoly with MyNetworkTV affiliate WATL (channel 36). The two stations have shared studio facilities and offices located at One Monroe Place on the north end of midtown Atlanta; WXIA's transmitter is located in the city's east section, near Kirkwood.
